name: mcp-proxy
description: Proxy MCP servers as VS Code Language Model Tools

mcpProxy.configFile.description: Path to the MCP server configuration JSON file. Relative paths are resolved from each workspace folder.

languageModelTools.name: mcp-call
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Call any tool from MCP servers configured in the workspace MCP config file (set `mcpProxy.configFile` to override the default .vscode/mcp.json). Use 'mcp-list' first to discover available servers and tools. This tool allows you to invoke MCP server tools like browser automation, file operations, and more.

server.description: The name of the MCP server (as defined in mcp.json)

tool.description: The name of the tool to call on the MCP server

arguments.description: The arguments to pass to the tool (as a JSON object)

languageModelTools.name: mcp-list
languageModelTools.modelDescription: List all available MCP servers and their tools from the workspace MCP config file (see `mcpProxy.configFile`). Use this to discover what MCP tools are available before calling them with 'mcp-call'.
languageModelTools.userDescription: List available MCP servers and tools

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
